title: How to view headers and complete text
creator: greg150
content:
One feature missing from K9/Thunderbird for android is ability to view the complete email headers and text. Having the option to not only view headers is to view and export the complete email message. Can the developers add that ability in upcoming versions?

Been using K9 for years and now the Thunderbird beta.. Thanks

title: Notifications Very Slow And Unreliable
creator: kent_sam
content:
I'm on a Fairphone 5 and downloaded the beta. I'm getting email notifications finally but for the first few days I didn't get any notifications about emails from the app. Now that I'm finally getting them they're delayed by about 2 hours.

Is there a way to tell thunderbird to refresh more often? Is this expected during the beta or is it a problem my end?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Android 14; Mobile; rv:138.0) Gecko/138.0 Firefox/138.0;os:Latest FP Android Build

title: thunderbird mail synchronisation
creator: wolfgang.pussak
content: Using Thunderbird on an Android smartphone and a tablet for a web.de account: sometimes single emails are not shown on the tablet, while they are visible on the smartphone. Both devices have the same Thunderbird release 9.0. I have no idea, why this happens. Do you?

title: How to get help from Support when noone replies on Forums?
creator: Tombarkas
content:
Trying on here, as I suspect the android forum gets little attention.

I can send email with TB for Android over the Internet from home, but not over the Internet in 4 out of 4 cafes. it's not due to a VPN. It only happens eith Thunderbird, not Gmail or Outlook.
